amendment.description: Amendment adds to the bill the text of H.R. 2, the Housing Opportunity and Responsibility Act, which passed the House on May 14, 1997.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record to add the text of H.R. 2, the Housing Opportunity and Responsibility Act to the bill.

action.text: On agreeing to the Lazio amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 181 (Roll No. 296).
